code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navigation(_ref){let{activeSection,scrollToSection}=_ref;const sectionNames={hero:'Home',about:'About Me',workexperience:'Work Experience',education:'Education',skills:'Skills',projects:'Projects'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:Object.entries(sectionNames).map(_ref2=>{let[id,name]=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:activeSection===id?'active':'',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>scrollToSection(id),children:name})},id);})})});}export default Navigation;
